name: rosie
text: Beef's catlike pose is a little creepy. Boris' bad password is hilarious though.

name: saurkraus
text: You tend to forget that they're cats after a while don't you?

name: spinynorman
text: Ray hissing and leaping in the Great Outdoor Fight honestly bewildered me for several minutes. Seriously, it'd be like seeing John Goodman hiss and leap. It says something that the characters completely override their appearance.

name: tekende
text: Considering how fat John Goodman is these days, I'd be pretty impressed by that sight.

name: spinynorman
text: Nwalins will do that to a person.

name: salvar
text: I thought he did that in The Big Lebowski.

name: evolume
text: His new password will be "passw0rd"

name: deusoma
text: I'm not sure he's even smart enough to use the zero.

name: rumblefish
text: The zero will be an accident caused by him turning to make sure Gregor isn't trying to steal his sandwich.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: and since he didn't realize said zero, when he loses his job they are unable to remove his account. boris is forever.

name: elzilcho
text: He is een-veen-see-bell!

name: dtuba
text: Chubby for Goldeneye reference.

name: pogo
text: Nothin' creepy about him actually looking like a cat for a change.  I think this is the first time any of the characters were drawn in a "natural" pose.  Looks cool.

name: wurlitzergirl
text: Actually it makes him look like a superspy.

name: zathyr
text: I thought it made him look all ninja like.  All Crouching Beef, Hyddyn Sceptyre.  Or Honking Bus, Rusty Bikes, as the case may be.

name: rheabird13
text: more like a lizard, i'd say...

name: salvar
text: I think he looks like an otter.

name: wonelove
text: Boris is not invincible.

name: serious_man
text: i accidentally the internet

name: peppermint
text: Yeah, he acts so human-like, to be reminded that he is a cat is a little... unnerving.

name: zem
text: One of the best

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by glorify, perhapsmaybe, alchemicnirvana)

name: spinynorman
text: Gypsies toss out some pretty weird curses these days. Animals changing passwords? Gay inheritance? Whatever happened to just making a dude really, really thin?

name: usversusthem
text: These days, that's more of a potential career in modeling than a curse, really.

name: boredom_man
text:
"Excuse me, sir?
Thinner with Kurt Lagerfeld."

name: slab64
text:
Sorry, i think its Karl

/pedant

name: jenny_tremain
text: Stephen King references always necessitate a chubby.

name: anomalous3
text: A comment left by anomalous3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JohnnyLandmine, ishuta, chivalress, Howard, thedudeabides85, mystkmanat, Wulvaine)

name: bookofsand
text: A comment left by bookofsand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, DeimosRising, Ebessan, brianstanwyck)

name: mr2tyler
text: YAHOO!  NOT GOOGLE!  YAHOO!

name: professorhazard
text: Damn, it's true! I need to leave both a Lame and a Chubby at once!

name: the_doz
text: BROWN COUCH! BROWN COUCH! BROWN COUCH! PAY ATTENTION!

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dboothe, mortshire, Connellingus, Methadone, yingkaixing, Madoushi)

name: delzhand
text: Yahoo personals are stored as .txt files in the Chief Security Officer's user directory.

name: yomimono
text:
I have a friend who once worked at Yahoo!.
This would really not surprise me at all.

name: deancain29
text: I thinks its the first time you ever see one of the Cats in an actual cat-stance

name: honesttom
text: Nobody does comedy Eastern European accents like Onstad.

name: jesler729
text: Goddang those boys are laughing up a storm in there

name: stuart
text: I have used this password as a temporary pass. It has replaced qweasd and 8008135.

name: puguglypress
text: If they ever remake the movie Hackers I think they'll have to update "Secret, sex and God" to include "5318008"

name: astro_zombie
text: These Russians choose to speak to each other in broken English for their own reasons. It is their decision.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stop, godfatherofsouls, Methadone, cailetshadow, erinye, Quartzblade)

name: farqussus
text: Never to any of the other Yahoo security officers. Only he has animals changing his password.

name: geysershitdick
text: Gregor really dodged a bullet on this one.

name: i_love_kate
text: I think it's Boris that's known for dodging bullets.

name: landowmpg
text: Why do they call him the "Bullet-Dodger"?

name: denise
text: this was my password for the longest time.

name: usversusthem
text: So glad I'm not the only one. Hella solid password if none of your friends read Achewood, though.

name: etoosa
text: I still use this password for things like my laptop because NONE of my roommates read Achewood.

name: heccibiggs
text: I got as far as "Beef's leet is.." and then though, fuck this, I'm moving on in the archive.

name: charchar
text:
Beef's leet is rather poor; at least he tried.

(Mine is also somewhat substandard. See you later in the archives.)

name: spinynorman
text: I'm still pretty fucking shocked that L33t turned out to be a real goddamn thing. I thought it was just something people shouted on Counterstrike in high school.

name: achilleselbow
text: You were way ahead of me before, but now you're only 21 hours ahead. That means I still have 3 years worth of comics in which I can catch up to you. Creepy? Maybe.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Man, I don't know. Charchar is like a day ahead of me, and you're apparently about a day behing, although you seem to be going at a slightly faster pace, apparently.

It's all confusing but brilliant.

name: heccibiggs
text: Ugh, you can go ahead and assume I meant "behind" there.

name: confusion
text: Am I the only one who actually enjoyed seeing Beef in a traditional feline pose for once?

name: mugi
text: No, I also enjoyed it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yes. it was uncomfortable to view the anthropoid cat to be doing a thing.

name: jugglinfreak
text: Why this always happens to ME?!

name: butch
text: I believe Beef's pose in the first frame is more of a chameleon referencs as opposed to a cat reference.

name: bozendoka
text:
A few days ago I heard "Livin' at the Corner of Dude and Catastrophe" and decided to see what Achewood was all about, since I'd only seen a few random head scratching strips. I've spent several hours more than is entirely reasonable getting to this point.

"All honking and dragging a bunch of rusty bikes"

I regret nothing.

name: jonmw
text: One of us! One of us!

name: deusoma
text: There's just something that amuses me about the way the nameplate says "Chief Security Yahoo!"
